titleStmt.title: Animadversions by way of answer to a sermon preached by Dr. Thomas Kenne, Lord Bishop of Bath and Wells, in the Cathedral Church of Bath, on Ascension-Day last, being the fifth day of May, 1687
titleStmt.author: Reed, John, Father.

notesStmt.note: Attributed by Wing to John Reed.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
